name: segment_company_quarter_rankings
description:
Ranks companies within each customer segment based on key performance metrics (Conversion Rate, ROI, Acquisition Cost, CTR)
for the current quarter (last 3 months of available data). This model identifies top-performing companies for specific segments
and provides performance relative to segment and global averages. Used in Segment Performance Rankings dashboards and
for targeting strategy recommendations.

columns.name: Customer_Segment
columns.description: The customer segment the company's performance is evaluated within.

columns.name: Company
columns.description: The company being evaluated.

columns.name: avg_conversion_rate
columns.description: Average conversion rate for the company within this segment for the current quarter.

columns.name: avg_roi
columns.description: Average Return on Investment (ROI) for the company within this segment for the current quarter.

columns.name: avg_acquisition_cost
columns.description: Average acquisition cost for the company within this segment for the current quarter.

columns.name: overall_ctr
columns.description: Overall Click-Through Rate (CTR) calculated as total clicks / total impressions for the company within this segment for the current quarter.

columns.name: campaign_count
columns.description: The total number of campaigns run by the company within this segment during the current quarter.

columns.name: conversion_rate_rank
columns.description: Rank of the company within the segment based on average conversion rate (descending - 1 is best).

columns.name: roi_rank
columns.description: Rank of the company within the segment based on average ROI (descending - 1 is best).

columns.name: acquisition_cost_rank
columns.description: Rank of the company within the segment based on average acquisition cost (ascending - 1 is best).

columns.name: ctr_rank
columns.description: Rank of the company within the segment based on overall CTR (descending - 1 is best).

columns.name: total_companies_per_segment
columns.description: Total number of unique companies evaluated within this customer segment for the quarter.

columns.name: is_top_conversion_company
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if this company has the highest average conversion rate (rank 1) in the segment.

columns.name: is_top_roi_company
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if this company has the highest average ROI (rank 1) in the segment.

columns.name: is_top_acquisition_cost_company
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if this company has the lowest average acquisition cost (rank 1) in the segment.

columns.name: is_top_ctr_company
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if this company has the highest overall CTR (rank 1) in the segment.

columns.name: segment_avg_conversion_rate
columns.description: Average conversion rate across all companies within this segment for the current quarter.

columns.name: segment_avg_roi
columns.description: Average ROI across all companies within this segment for the current quarter.

columns.name: segment_avg_acquisition_cost
columns.description: Average acquisition cost across all companies within this segment for the current quarter.

columns.name: segment_avg_ctr
columns.description: Average overall CTR across all companies within this segment for the current quarter.

columns.name: company_count
columns.description: Count of distinct companies within this segment (should match total_companies_per_segment).

columns.name: conversion_rate_vs_segment_avg
columns.description: Company's average conversion rate relative to the segment average (e.g., 0.1 means 10% above segment average).

columns.name: roi_vs_segment_avg
columns.description: Company's average ROI relative to the segment average (e.g., 0.1 means 10% above segment average).

columns.name: acquisition_cost_vs_segment_avg
columns.description: Company's average acquisition cost relative to the segment average (inverted; e.g., 0.1 means 10% better/lower cost than segment average).

columns.name: ctr_vs_segment_avg
columns.description: Company's overall CTR relative to the segment average (e.g., 0.1 means 10% above segment average).

columns.name: conversion_rate_vs_global_avg
columns.description: Company's average conversion rate relative to the global average across all segments (e.g., 0.1 means 10% above global average).

columns.name: roi_vs_global_avg
columns.description: Company's average ROI relative to the global average across all segments (e.g., 0.1 means 10% above global average).

columns.name: acquisition_cost_vs_global_avg
columns.description: Company's average acquisition cost relative to the global average across all segments (inverted; e.g., 0.1 means 10% better/lower cost than global average).

columns.name: ctr_vs_global_avg
columns.description: Company's overall CTR relative to the global average across all segments (e.g., 0.1 means 10% above global average).
